description: Application for Non-Material amendment to planning permission ref: PA/20/01402, Dated 30/06/22.Non Material amendment(s) Sought: Application under Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for Non-Material Amendments to planning permission reference PA/20/01402/A2 dated 30 June 2022 (RN: PA/20/01402/A2) to allow for: (i). Small increase in the height of the parapets of Building 1 and Building 3;(ii). Adjustment to the tower cladding material; (iii).  Increase the size of openable purge vent panels; (iv). Adjustment to sky-garden cladding; (v). adjustments to the cladding composition of all three buildings; (adjust the positions of the windows, solid panels, and openable panels); (vi). Revisions to the residential layouts in Building 1; (vii). Introduction of opaque metal panels to the podium levels; (viii). Replacement of the student lobby and entrance doors from the consented layout with curved sliding doors and an external draught lobby; (ix). Adjustments to the podium doors and cladding; (x). Omission of balcony to level 02 residential play space; (xi). Relocation of management suite from Level 01 to Level 02; (xii). Addition of a plant mezzanine; (xiii). Relocation of the northern basement perimeter wall southwards and reconfiguration of the internal basement layout; (xiv). Addition of two smoke extract fans to the podium roof; (xv). Relocation of 83 cycle spaces from Level 01 to Level B2 as a result of internal layout changes required by 'Secure by Design'; (xvi) Adjustment to the ground floor retail unit for Building Control and Fire Regulation requirements; (xvii) Additional signage for McDonalds and an amendment to the McDonald's entrance
